creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, text and photomechanical illustration of one police officer dancing with, or possibly choking, another police officer; 28 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: World War IX Presents... Earaches and Eyesores, Issue #1
